snippet.title: Kimi ni Todoke 01 DS English Gameplay (subtitles)
snippet.description:
Kimi ni Todoke: Sodateru Omoi DS by Namco Bandai.

You'll need Annotations On, or it won't be translated correctly.
I just played through with subtitles, and explained tutorials in the game :)

This is a story about a girl who gets misunderstood as creepy, so everyone is afraid of her.  In actuality, she's a very sweet, kind girl who just wants to get along with her classmates better. However, it seems her name, Sawako, often gets misheard or compared to Sadako (which is a popular horror character from The Ring). The Ring is about a dead ghost girl, who pops out of the TV screen to kill their victims. This happens after a certain amount of days have passed when someone views a cursed video tape connected to her.

Note: The translations may different from the original Japanese text. I took a more liberal approach and changed some meanings to make it sound smoother and more natural in English. I'm still in the learning process, so I can't guarantee the translations are 100% correct. 

Hope you enjoy the video!
